title: "A Real Challenger" Mission stuck at 3/4 with no other missions; Is this a bug?
body:
"A Real Challenger" seemed to appear ambiguously. It asks that you complete 4 other missions. Any previously completed mission before "A Real Challenger" will NOT count towards it. I bought the 1,300 RP ticket AFTER I completed 1 of the 2 basic missions, and "A Real Challenger" appeared around that time.

Questions for Riot Tech Support:
Does it come with the ticket?
If so, why didn't it count the previously completed mission?
If it's not intended to retroactively count completed missions, then why isn't it specified before purchase?
If it does not come with the ticket, when does it appear?
If it's suppose to retroactively count completed missions, can I get help debugging "A Real Challenger"?

If you are a player who is using this system, please complete the poll down below.

Any help and all would be appreciated.

replies.body: More missions towards the overall completion will come each week aligned with Worlds.  **Everyone **participating with a pass should be at 3/4, until week 2 starts.  Those who went 4/4 were able to do so due to a bug, but everyone will be able to progress just the same.  Sorry for the confusion!
